title: Task Document Schema
description: Schema for a task document stored in the Firestore 'tasks' collection.

completed.description: Indicates whether the task has been completed (true) or not (false).

created.description: Timestamp of when the task was created.

details.description: Additional details or description of the task.

title.description: The title of the task, usually a short summary of what needs to be done.

user.description: Firestore document reference to the user who owns this task (e.g., /users/{uid}).
